EmailTemplate.description: Email a user receives when they try to reset their password, but have been locked out because of too many failed login attempts.
EmailTemplate.name: Communities: User Lockout Email Custom
EmailTemplate.subject: You've been locked out of Citron Hygiene portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
We received your request to reset your Citron Hygiene portal password. We can't reset your password right now. Your account is locked after too many login attempts.
{!CASE(1, IF(VALUE(PASSWORD_LOCK_TIME) > 0, 1, 0), "Try again in " + PASSWORD_LOCK_TIME + " minutes.", IF(VALUE(PASSWORD_LOCK_TIME) < 0, 1, 0), "Contact your " + Citron Hygiene portal + " administrator to unlock your account.", "")}
If you didn't request a password reset or haven't tried to log in to your account recently, contact your Citron Hygiene portal administrator or reply to this email.
Thank you.
Citron Hygiene 800.643.6922
